_comment: This data is an early work-in-progress and contains errors. Produced by @michaelh at Discuss and Discover SuttaCentral forum - please get in touch! Finished code forthcoming.

Perception of limited and limitless ligh: Limited immersion leads to limited vision
Limited vision leads to limited perception of light and forms
Limitless immersion leads to limitless vision
Limitless vision leads to limitless perception of light and forms
Three ways of developing immersion [mn12: Placing the mind and keeping it connected
Keeping the mind connected without placing it
Developing immersion without placing the mind or keeping it connected
